el:comments.el:code: this is just a fun level to take the game engine to its max power.

el:protected.el:luamain:
-- level dimensions and standards levelw = 20 levelh = 13 create_world(levelw, levelh) oxyd_default_flavor = "d" draw_border("st-rock1") fill_floor("fl-black", 0,0, level_width,level_height)
-- multiplayer function with no yinyang function multiplayer_mode() actor={"ac-blackball", {player=0, mouseforce=1}} actor={"ac-whiteball", {player=1, mouseforce=1}} end
-- oxyd stones oxyd(1,1) oxyd(18,1) oxyd(1,11) oxyd(18,11) oxyd_shuffle()
-- blackball set_actor("ac-blackball", 10.5, 6.5, {player=0})
